body_html: Sorry, I was out of office for a while. I still think it would be useful to have this in the standard library, and I don't think that the tensorflow license allows basing the implementation on their code. IANAL, but I do think it's all right to use their api to identify what common loss functions might be worth adding beyond this one. Does anyone know?
